sections.title: MCP Tool Integration
sections.content:
Claude Code now supports Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools, allowing integration with external services.

You can connect tools like Puppeteer for browser automation, Slack for team communication, and more.
sections.example:
claude --mcp puppeteer
# Now you can use browser automation commands

sections.title: Enhanced Code Review
sections.content: The /review command has been enhanced with new options for security and performance analysis.
